activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13396
activity.text: @AdityaJ2305 I guess it's not a bug, in preview mode it has an option to retake the picture and if the user cancels it or uploads it the camera stops as intended.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13200
activity.text:
Hey team @Jacobjeevan , @rithviknishad if this issue is valid I would like to work on it.
Why this happens : The search input is initially empty due to which the ValueSetSearchContent component displays this.
Possible approach : Modify ValueSetSearchContent to display items by default when the user hasn’t typed anything.
ETA : 1 Day

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13073
activity.text:
@AdityaJ2305 Just to Just to clarify is the issue mainly about:
1. The required field errors showing up inside the optional “Components” section after adding one?
OR
2.The dropdowns (Data type and Unit) looking misaligned after submitting the blank form?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12794
activity.text:
Hey! @rithviknishad @AdityaJ2305 
I would like to work on this issue,
My approach : 
- Inside the phone-input component use a state variable to control Popover's open/close status.
- Update the state when the country is selected.
ETA: Today

open_prs.title: Add loading animation to ValueSetSearchContent component
